titles.title: Law Enforcement Officer and Firefighter Recreation Pass Act
Law Enforcement Officer and Firefighter Recreation Pass Act
To amend the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act to provide for an annual National Recreational Pass for law enforcement officers and firefighters.

bill.summary:
Law Enforcement Officer and Firefighter Recreation Pass Act
This bill directs the Department of Agriculture and the Department of the Interior to make the National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass available, at no cost, to a law enforcement officer or firefighter who provides adequate proof of eligibility.
